Detailed Description

General file copy or transformation.

This implementation uses general file loader, saver and any object instance.

const istd::CString &  outputFilePath,
const iprm::IParamsSet *  paramsPtr = NULL 
) const [virtual]

Copy a file inputFilePath to destination outputFilePath.

Optionally, you can use paramsPtr to control the copy process.

Implements ibase::IFileConvertCopy.
